title: Mobile-Based Media Literacy Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: A course focused on intensively developing media information analysis competencies in mobile environments for mathematics majors and job-seeking students.

learning_goals: Learners can apply techniques to mathematically analyze data biases in various media contents.
Learners can evaluate ideological frames of media messages in mobile environments using at least three analytical tools.
Learners understand the media production process and can develop a content creation plan linked to their major (mathematics).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
